    • tarkistaAPIavain

      public static int tarkistaAPIavain(String apikey)
      Check that apikey is in dim_service table
      Parameters:
      apikey - String very long secret random String. Each service have own.
      Returns:
      int service Id or -1 = INVALID

      public Sisältö realCreate(int serviceid, int scheme, Connection connection)
      Luo pysyvän tunnisteen tietokantaan
      Parameters:
      serviceid - int dimservice-table index
      scheme - int dim_pid_scheme index
      connection - Connection to database
      Returns:
      Sisältö Full pid components (URN or Handle)
